content:
What a great idea! I've added the new reminder for your Friday coffee break.

**Reminder 6: Coffee Break (Fridays, 3:00 PM)**
* Every Friday at 3:00 PM, you'll receive a reminder to grab a coffee and take a short walk outside.

Here's an updated summary of your reminders:

* Monday: 7:15 AM - Meditation Session, 12:30 PM - Lunch Break, 9:30 PM - Reading Time
* Tuesday: 12:30 PM - Lunch Break, 3:00 PM - Conference Call, 4:30 PM - Yoga Class, 9:30 PM - Reading Time
* Wednesday: 7:15 AM - Meditation Session, 12:30 PM - Lunch Break, 9:30 PM - Reading Time
* Thursday: 12:30 PM - Lunch Break, 3:00 PM - Conference Call, 9:30 PM - Reading Time
* Friday: 7:15 AM - Meditation Session, 12:30 PM - Lunch Break, 3:00 PM - Coffee Break, 9:30 PM - Reading Time
* Saturday and Sunday: No reminders

You now have a reminder to take a break and recharge on Fridays with a coffee and a short walk outside!
